text:
Two members of the billionaire Sackler family that owns Purdue Pharma, the maker of OxyContin, largely deflected blame as they faced furious questions from lawmakers in rare public testimony about the deadly opioid epidemic.

name: nytimes
text:
Federal judges in Georgia moved on Thursday to dismiss two separate cases filed by Republicans that sought to curb the use of absentee ballots in advance of next month’s highly anticipated runoff elections for the state’s two Senate seats.

name: nytimes
text:
Part mystery-thriller and part screwball comedy, “The Flight Attendant” on HBO Max was “so tonally challenging, I did every scene multiple ways,” said Kaley Cuoco, the show’s star and executive producer.

name: nytimes
text:
Mayor Lori Lightfoot of Chicago apologized to a social worker who was handcuffed naked by police officers who burst into her apartment with a battering ram last year. They were looking for someone else.
